mapper.select: SELECT e.ex_part, e.ex_name, d.set_num, d.weight, d.reps FROM record r JOIN detail d ON r.record_id = d.record_id JOIN exercise e ON d.ex_id = e.ex_id WHERE r.record_id in ( SELECT record_id FROM record WHERE user_seq = #{userSeq} ORDER BY record_date DESC LIMIT 10 ) AND e.ex_id = #{exId} ORDER BY d.detail_id ;
SELECT e.ex_part, e.ex_name, d.set_num, d.weight, d.reps FROM detail d JOIN exercise e ON d.ex_id = e.ex_id WHERE e.ex_part = #{exPart};
